title: Fairly heavy showers expected in some places today
byline: Showers will occur at times in the Western, Sabaragamuwa, Central, Southern and North-western provinces today (15), the Department of Meteorology said.

title: 26 arrested with drugs at party organised through Facebook
byline: A total of 26 individuals have been taken into custody along with drugs during a raid conducted at a party which was organized through Facebook in Panadura, police stated.

title: Iran strikes Israel with new missile, drone attack; Israel bombs Tehran
byline: Israel and Iran have carried out a new wave of attacks on key cities, fuelling fears of an all-out sustained war, with heavy exchanges now entering a third day.

title: Woman shot and killed by husband in Medagama
byline: An incident has been reported where an individual had allegedly shot and killed his wife in Balagasara, Medagama, police stated.

title: President Anura Kumara concludes official visit to Germany
byline: President Anura Kumara Dissanayake has concluded his first official visit to the Federal Republic of Germany.

title: First Deputy Managing Director of IMF to arrive in Sri Lanka today
byline: Dr Gita Gopinath, the First Deputy Managing Director (FDMD) of the International Monetary Fund (IMF), is scheduled to arrive in Sri Lanka today.

title: Special notice to Sri Lankans employed in Israel
byline: A special notice has been issued to Sri Lankans who are employed in Israel and currently in the country on holiday.

title: Landslide warnings issued for several areas in seven districts
byline: Early landslide warnings have been issued for multiple areas in seven districts as heavy rainfall continues in parts of the island.

title: Sri Lankan woman in Israel sustains injuries in attacks carried out by Iran
byline: A Sri Lankan woman residing in Bat Yam, Israel has sustained minor injuries in overnight attacks carried out by Iran, the Sri Lankan Embassy in Israel has confirmed.

title: President Anura Kumara returns after concluding official visit to Germany
byline: President Anura Kumara Dissanayake has arrived in the island, a short while ago, following the conclusion of his official visit to Germany, Ada Derana reporter said.

title: Seven killed in helicopter crash in Uttarakhand, India
byline: At least seven people were killed after a helicopter crashed in a remote part of Uttarakhand, India on Sunday, news agency PTI reported.

title: First Deputy Managing Director of IMF arrives in Sri Lanka
byline: Dr. Gita Gopinath, the First Deputy Managing Director (FDMD) of the International Monetary Fund (IMF), has arrived in the island, Ada Derana reporter said.

title: Amber weather warning for heavy rains issued for parts of Sri Lanka
byline: An Amber weather warning has been issued for heavy rains in the Western, Sabaragamuwa and North-western provinces and in the Nuwara-Eliya, Kandy, Galle and Matara districts.

title: Tourist arrivals in June top 40,000
byline: A total of 43,962 tourists have arrived in the country thus far in June, data from the Sri Lanka Tourism Development Authority (SLTDA) shows.

title: Shooting incident reported in Kalubowila
byline: Two unidentified individuals, who arrived on a motorcycle, opened fire at a residence along Temple Road in Kalubowila, early this morning (15).

title: After day of nationwide protests, Trump’s military parade rolls through D.C.
byline: President Donald Trump‘s long-sought military parade rolled though the streets of downtown Washington on Saturday, but the celebration of the U.S. Army’s 250th anniversary was marred by a day of violence and discord.

title: Bodies of more than 1,000 Ukrainian soldiers returned to Kyiv after prisoner swap
byline: More than 1,000 Ukrainian bodies have been handed back to Kyiv after a prisoner-of-war exchange - as Volodymyr Zelenskyy renews calls for sanctions.

title: Sri Lanka’s Vishmitha Divyanja wins Mister Fitness Supermodel World 2025
byline: Sri Lanka’s Vishmitha Divyanja has been crowned Mister Fitness Supermodel World 2025 at the grand finale held in Ho Chi Minh City, Vietnam.

title: British fighter jet makes emergency landing in Kerala
byline: A British F-35 fighter jet made an emergency landing at the Thiruvananthapuram International Airport in Kerala, India after running low on fuel last night.

title: Who will be the next Colombo Mayor? Decision tomorrow
byline: The newly elected Colombo Municipal Council, following the conduct of the Local Government (LG) election on May 6, is scheduled to convene for its inaugural sitting tomorrow (16).
